messages.subject: Magnetic and felt boards
messages.msgSnippet: I picked up a couple of new things for my DD this afternoon.  I got her a magnetic board with an underwater scene and lots of pieces to go with it as well as a
messages.messageBody:
I picked up a couple of new things for my DD this afternoon. I got
her a magnetic board with an underwater scene and lots of pieces to
go with it as well as a felt board and farm animal pieces.

We had SO much fun playing with them this afternoon. I had
forgotten just how much fun it can be to make up your own stories.
I would make up a story and my DD would grab the piece from me and
say "No, mom, that's not what happened." or "I don't think so mom"
and make up some other story for what "actually" happened. :)

Melissa
